info.description: This is a sample server celler server.
info.title: Swagger Example API

get.description: Get all games. If the 'WithTrendy' query parameter is true, the response will be a 'GameWithTrendy' object. Otherwise, the response will be an array of 'models.Game'.

parameters.description: Add trendy games to the response
parameters.name: WithTrendy

get.description: Get the ranking of a user for all games
get.summary: Get the ranking of a user for all games

post.description: Add a user to a guild
post.summary: Add a user to a guild

delete.description: Remove a user from a guild
delete.summary: Remove a user from a guild

put.description: Update a match with the given ID.

get.description: Get a match with the given ID.

parameters.description: Add trendy games to the response
parameters.name: WithTrendy

parameters.description: Tag object that needs to be created
parameters.name: tag

parameters.description: Tag object that needs to be updated
parameters.name: tag

parameters.description: Add recent tournaments to the response
parameters.name: WithRecents

parameters.description: Sort order (use 'start_date' for ascending order, '-start_date' for descending order)
parameters.name: Sort
